Finalize the project schedule based on feedback received during the team meeting. Distribute the final version to all stakeholders.
Finalize the weekly progress report for executive leadership. Include key accomplishments, challenges, and upcoming milestones.

Review all deliverables to ensure they are completed on time and to the required quality standards. Follow up with team members on any outstanding items.
Plan for the next week's tasks and objectives. Review the project schedule and identify any potential roadblocks.
